title: "He pulled one over on us": Family that took in Cruz
text:
"He pulled one over on us": Family that took in Cruz   01:11 
The family that opened their home to Florida school shooting suspect Nikolas Cruz says they thought he was ''just depressed over his mother's death'' and that they were ''absolutely floored'' after the shooting. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).   
The family that opened their home to Florida school shooting suspect Nikolas Cruz says they thought he was "just depressed over his mother's death" and that they were "absolutely floored" after the shooting. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).  //reut.rs/2sGjLUO
